WebRTCé€šè®¯ç¤ºä¾‹

B2-4AC2024å¹´4æœˆ3æ—¥å¤§çº¦ 9 åˆ†é’ŸwebWebRTChtmlWebRTCjs/ts

web_rtcç¤ºä¾‹

æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹

1.WebRTCéœ€è¦é€šè¿‡å…¶ä»–æ–¹å¼ç±»ä¼¼tcpåè®®/æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤åˆ¶ç²˜è´´/æœåŠ¡å™¨äº¤äº’ç­‰ç­‰äº¤æ¢offerå’Œansweræ„å»ºé€šé“ï¼Œæ„å»ºåå®ç°/è°ƒç”¨å„ç§é€šè®¯åŠŸèƒ½
2.å‘é€æ–¹å’Œæ¥æ”¶æ–¹åœ¨éç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨stunæœåŠ¡å™¨å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸åŒipçš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹é€šè®¯(ä»£ç é»˜è®¤æä¾›è°·æ­Œå…¬ç”¨stunæœåŠ¡å™¨)ï¼›ä¸ä½¿ç”¨stunæœåŠ¡å™¨(å³æ³¨é‡ŠiceServers)æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œåœ¨å±€åŸŸç½‘(åŒä¸€wifiåº”è¯¥ä¹Ÿç®—)ä¸‹ä¹Ÿå¯é€šè®¯ã€‚
3.åœ¨ä¸ä½¿ç”¨turnæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå‘é€æ–¹æˆ–æ¥å—æ–¹ä»»æ„ä¸€æ–¹æˆ–ä¸¤æ–¹å¤„äºç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œéƒ½ä¸å¯é€šè®¯(å¤§æ¦‚ç‡ä¸ç§»åŠ¨è¿è¥å•†æœ‰å…³)ã€‚
4.turnæœåŠ¡å™¨å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é…ç½®ç‰¹å®švpnä»£æ›¿ï¼Œå…¶å®è¿˜æ˜¯å½¢æˆå±€åŸŸç½‘ç¯å¢ƒã€‚

å¯é€šè¿‡åŒä¸€æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸åŒæ ‡ç­¾é¡µæµ‹è¯•æ•ˆæœï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å…¶ä»–ä»£ç (å¦‚flutter)è¿è¡Œæœ‰ç±»ä¼¼æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤åˆ¶ç²˜è´´offerå’Œansweræ•ˆæœï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸ç½‘é¡µé€šè®¯

            <button id="copyOfferBtn" disabled>å¤åˆ¶Offer</button>
            <button id="pasteAnswerBtn" disabled>ç²˜è´´Answer</button>
            <button id="copyAnswerBtn" disabled>å¤åˆ¶Answer</button>
            <button id="pasteOfferBtn" disabled>ç²˜è´´Offer</button>
            <button id="hangupBtn" disabled>æŒ‚æ–­</button>
        </div>
        <div id="status" class="status">å‡†å¤‡å¼€å§‹</div>

                    <li>æ¥æ”¶æ–¹å‘å›Answeråï¼Œç²˜è´´åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†å¹¶ç‚¹å‡»"ç²˜è´´Answer"</li>

                    <li>ç‚¹å‡»"å¤åˆ¶Answer"æŒ‰é’®å¤åˆ¶SDPä¿¡æ¯</li>

<script>
    // é…ç½®STUN/TURNæœåŠ¡å™¨
    const configuration = {
        //è‹¥æ³¨é‡ŠiceServersï¼Œåˆ™åªèƒ½åœ¨å±€åŸŸç½‘ä½¿ç”¨ï¼›æ²¡æœ‰é…ç½®turnæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œç§»åŠ¨æ•°æ®ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨
        iceServers: [
            {
              urls: "stun:stun.l.google.com:19302"
            }
        ],
    };

    let peerConnection;
    let localStream;
    let isCaller = false;
    let dataChannel;

    // DOMå…ƒç´ 
    const elements = {
        startBtn: document.getElementById("startBtn"),
        copyOfferBtn: document.getElementById("copyOfferBtn"),
        pasteAnswerBtn: document.getElementById("pasteAnswerBtn"),
        copyAnswerBtn: document.getElementById("copyAnswerBtn"),
        pasteOfferBtn: document.getElementById("pasteOfferBtn"),
        hangupBtn: document.getElementById("hangupBtn"),
        statusDiv: document.getElementById("status"),
        sdpTextarea: document.getElementById("sdpTextarea"),
        localVideo: document.getElementById("localVideo"),
        remoteVideo: document.getElementById("remoteVideo"),
        localVideoPlaceholder: document.getElementById("localVideoPlaceholder"),
        remoteVideoPlaceholder: document.getElementById(
                "remoteVideoPlaceholder"
        ),
        chatMessages: document.getElementById("chatMessages"),
        chatInput: document.getElementById("chatInput"),
        sendBtn: document.getElementById("sendBtn"),
        // æ·»åŠ æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“ç›¸å…³å…ƒç´ 
        fileInput: document.getElementById("fileInput"),
        sendFileBtn: document.getElementById("sendFileBtn"),
        fileList: document.getElementById("fileList"),
    };

    // æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“ç›¸å…³å˜é‡
    let fileChannel;
    const chunkSize = 16384; // 16KB åˆ†å—å¤§å°
    let fileQueue = [];
    let currentFile = null;
    let receiveBuffer = [];
    let receivedSize = 0;
    let fileInfo = null;

    // å¼€å§‹é€šè¯
    elements.startBtn.onclick = async () => {
        try {
            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "æ­£åœ¨è·å–åª’ä½“è®¾å¤‡...";
            disableAllButtons();

            // è¯¢é—®ç”¨æˆ·è§’è‰²
            isCaller = confirm(
                    "æ‚¨æ˜¯å‘èµ·æ–¹å—ï¼Ÿ(ç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®šä½œä¸ºå‘èµ·æ–¹ï¼Œå–æ¶ˆä½œä¸ºæ¥æ”¶æ–¹)"
            );

            // è·å–åª’ä½“æµï¼ˆæ·»åŠ å…·ä½“çº¦æŸï¼‰
            localStream = await navigator.mediaDevices
                    .getUserMedia({
                        audio: {
                            echoCancellation: true,
                            noiseSuppression: true,
                            autoGainControl: true,
                        },
                        video: {
                            width: { ideal: 1280 },
                            height: { ideal: 720 },
                            frameRate: { ideal: 30 },
                        },
                    })
                    .catch(async (err) => {
                        console.error("è§†é¢‘è·å–å¤±è´¥:", err);
                        elements.statusDiv.textContent =
                                "æœªæ£€æµ‹åˆ°è§†é¢‘è®¾å¤‡ï¼Œå°è¯•ä»…éŸ³é¢‘æ¨¡å¼";
                        return await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({
                            audio: {
                                echoCancellation: true,
                                noiseSuppression: true,
                            },
                        });
                    });

            // æ˜¾ç¤ºæœ¬åœ°è§†é¢‘
            if (localStream && localStream.getVideoTracks().length > 0) {
                elements.localVideoPlaceholder.style.display = "none";
                elements.localVideo.srcObject = localStream;
                elements.localVideo.style.display = "block";
                await elements.localVideo
                        .play()
                        .catch((e) => console.error("æœ¬åœ°è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾å¤±è´¥:", e));
            }

            // åˆ›å»ºPeerConnection
            peerConnection = new RTCPeerConnection(configuration);

            // æ·»åŠ æœ¬åœ°æµï¼ˆä¿®æ”¹æ·»åŠ æ–¹å¼ï¼‰
            if (localStream) {
                localStream.getTracks().forEach((track) => {
                    const sender = peerConnection.addTrack(track, localStream);
                    console.log(`æ·»åŠ æœ¬åœ°è½¨é“: ${track.kind}`, sender);
                });
            }

            // å¦‚æœæ˜¯å‘èµ·æ–¹ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®é€šé“
            if (isCaller) {
                dataChannel = peerConnection.createDataChannel("chat");
                setupDataChannel(dataChannel);

                // åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“é€šé“
                fileChannel = peerConnection.createDataChannel("file");
                setupFileChannel(fileChannel);
            } else {
                // å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ¥æ”¶æ–¹ï¼Œç›‘å¬æ•°æ®é€šé“
                peerConnection.ondatachannel = (event) => {
                    if (event.channel.label === "chat") {
                        dataChannel = event.channel;
                        setupDataChannel(dataChannel);
                    } else if (event.channel.label === "file") {
                        fileChannel = event.channel;
                        setupFileChannel(fileChannel);
                    }
                };
            }

            // ICEå€™é€‰å¤„ç†
            peerConnection.onicecandidate = (event) => {
                if (event.candidate) {
                    console.log("ICE candidate:", event.candidate);
                }
            };

            // è¿œç¨‹æµåˆ°è¾¾ï¼ˆæ”¹è¿›å¤„ç†æ–¹å¼ï¼‰
            peerConnection.ontrack = (event) => {
                console.log("æ”¶åˆ°è¿œç¨‹è½¨é“:", event.track.kind);
                const stream = event.streams[0];

                if (event.track.kind === "video") {
                    elements.remoteVideoPlaceholder.style.display = "none";
                    elements.remoteVideo.srcObject = stream;
                    elements.remoteVideo.style.display = "block";

                    // ç¡®ä¿è§†é¢‘æ­£å¸¸æ’­æ”¾
                    elements.remoteVideo
                            .play()
                            .catch((e) => console.error("è¿œç¨‹è§†é¢‘æ’­æ”¾å¤±è´¥:", e));
                }

                if (event.track.kind === "audio") {
                    // ç¡®ä¿éŸ³é¢‘æ­£å¸¸æ’­æ”¾
                    const audioElement = document.createElement("audio");
                    audioElement.autoplay = true;
                    audioElement.srcObject = stream;
                    document.body.appendChild(audioElement);
                }

                elements.statusDiv.textContent = "é€šè¯å·²è¿æ¥";
                elements.hangupBtn.disabled = false;
                elements.chatInput.disabled = false;
                elements.sendBtn.disabled = false;
                // å¯ç”¨æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“æŒ‰é’®
                elements.fileInput.disabled = false;
                elements.sendFileBtn.disabled = false;
            };

            // æ·»åŠ è¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€ç›‘æ§
            peerConnection.oniceconnectionstatechange = () => {
                console.log("ICEè¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€:", peerConnection.iceConnectionState);
                elements.statusDiv.textContent = `ICEçŠ¶æ€: ${peerConnection.iceConnectionState}`;
            };

            peerConnection.onconnectionstatechange = () => {
                console.log("è¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€:", peerConnection.connectionState);
                if (peerConnection.connectionState === "connected") {
                    elements.statusDiv.textContent = "éŸ³è§†é¢‘è¿æ¥å·²å»ºç«‹";
                }
            };

            // æ ¹æ®è§’è‰²æ‰§è¡Œä¸åŒæµç¨‹
            if (isCaller) {
                elements.statusDiv.textContent = "æ­£åœ¨åˆ›å»ºOffer...";
                const offer = await peerConnection.createOffer({
                    offerToReceiveAudio: true,
                    offerToReceiveVideo: true,
                });
                await peerConnection.setLocalDescription(offer);

                elements.statusDiv.textContent = "Offeråˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆï¼Œè¯·å¤åˆ¶";
                elements.copyOfferBtn.disabled = false;
                elements.pasteAnswerBtn.disabled = false;
            } else {
                elements.statusDiv.textContent = "å‡†å¤‡æ¥æ”¶Offer";
                elements.pasteOfferBtn.disabled = false;
            }
        } catch (err) {
            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "é”™è¯¯: " + err.message;
            console.error(err);
            enableStartButton();
        }
    };

    // è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®é€šé“
    function setupDataChannel(channel) {
        channel.onopen = () => {
            addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", "èŠå¤©è¿æ¥å·²å»ºç«‹");
        };

        channel.onclose = () => {
            addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", "èŠå¤©è¿æ¥å·²å…³é—­");
        };

        channel.onmessage = (event) => {
            try {
                console.log(event);
                const message = JSON.parse(event.data);
                addMessage(message.sender, message.content);
            } catch {
                addMessage("å¯¹æ–¹", event.data);
            }
        };
    }

    // è®¾ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“é€šé“
    function setupFileChannel(channel) {
        channel.binaryType = "arraybuffer";

        channel.onopen = () => {
            console.log("æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“é€šé“å·²æ‰“å¼€");
            elements.fileInput.disabled = false;
            elements.sendFileBtn.disabled = false;
        };

        channel.onclose = () => {
            console.log("æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“é€šé“å·²å…³é—­");
            elements.fileInput.disabled = true;
            elements.sendFileBtn.disabled = true;
        };

        channel.onmessage = (event) => {
            const data = event.data;

            // å¦‚æœæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™æ˜¯æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
            if (typeof data === "string") {
                const message = JSON.parse(data);

                if (message.type === "file-info") {
                    // æ¥æ”¶åˆ°æ–°æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
                    fileInfo = message;
                    receiveBuffer = [];
                    receivedSize = 0;

                    // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ¥æ”¶æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
                    const fileItem = document.createElement("div");
                    fileItem.className = "file-item";
                    fileItem.id = `file-receive-${fileInfo.timestamp}`;
                    fileItem.innerHTML = `
                <div>
                  <strong>æ¥æ”¶æ–‡ä»¶:</strong> ${fileInfo.name} (${formatBytes(
                            fileInfo.size
                    )})
                  <div class="progress-bar">
                    <div class="progress" style="width: 0%"></div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              `;
                    elements.fileList.appendChild(fileItem);

                    addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", `æ­£åœ¨æ¥æ”¶æ–‡ä»¶: ${fileInfo.name}`);
                }
            } else {
                // æ¥æ”¶æ–‡ä»¶æ•°æ®å—
                receiveBuffer.push(data);
                receivedSize += data.byteLength;

                // æ›´æ–°è¿›åº¦æ¡
                if (fileInfo) {
                    const progress = Math.floor((receivedSize / fileInfo.size) * 100);
                    const fileItem = document.getElementById(
                            `file-receive-${fileInfo.timestamp}`
                    );
                    if (fileItem) {
                        const progressBar = fileItem.querySelector(".progress");
                        progressBar.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                    }

                    // æ–‡ä»¶æ¥æ”¶å®Œæˆ
                    if (receivedSize === fileInfo.size) {
                        const received = new Blob(receiveBuffer);
                        receiveBuffer = [];

                        // åˆ›å»ºä¸‹è½½é“¾æ¥
                        const downloadLink = document.createElement("a");
                        downloadLink.href = URL.createObjectURL(received);
                        downloadLink.download = fileInfo.name;
                        downloadLink.textContent = "ä¸‹è½½";
                        downloadLink.className = "download-link";

                        const fileItem = document.getElementById(
                                `file-receive-${fileInfo.timestamp}`
                        );
                        if (fileItem) {
                            fileItem.querySelector("div").appendChild(downloadLink);
                        }

                        addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", `æ–‡ä»¶æ¥æ”¶å®Œæˆ: ${fileInfo.name}`);
                        fileInfo = null;
                    }
                }
            }
        };
    }

    // å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶æŒ‰é’®ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
    elements.sendFileBtn.onclick = () => {
        const fileInput = elements.fileInput;
        if (fileInput.files.length === 0) {
            alert("è¯·å…ˆé€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶");
            return;
        }

        // å°†é€‰æ‹©çš„æ–‡ä»¶æ·»åŠ åˆ°é˜Ÿåˆ—
        for (let i = 0; i < fileInput.files.length; i++) {
            fileQueue.push(fileInput.files[i]);
        }

        // æ˜¾ç¤ºæ–‡ä»¶é˜Ÿåˆ—
        updateFileQueueDisplay();

        // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æ­£åœ¨ä¼ è¾“çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¼€å§‹ä¼ è¾“
        if (!currentFile) {
            sendNextFile();
        }

        // æ¸…ç©ºæ–‡ä»¶é€‰æ‹©
        fileInput.value = "";
    };

    // æ›´æ–°æ–‡ä»¶é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¾ç¤º
    function updateFileQueueDisplay() {
        fileQueue.forEach((file, index) => {
            // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»æ˜¾ç¤º
            const existingItem = document.getElementById(`file-queue-${index}`);
            if (!existingItem) {
                const fileItem = document.createElement("div");
                fileItem.className = "file-item";
                fileItem.id = `file-queue-${index}`;
                fileItem.innerHTML = `
              <div>
                <strong>ç­‰å¾…å‘é€:</strong> ${file.name} (${formatBytes(
                        file.size
                )})
                <div class="progress-bar">
                  <div class="progress" style="width: 0%"></div>
                </div>
              </div>
            `;
                elements.fileList.appendChild(fileItem);
            }
        });
    }

    // å‘é€ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
    function sendNextFile() {
        if (
                fileQueue.length === 0 ||
                !fileChannel ||
                fileChannel.readyState !== "open"
        ) {
            currentFile = null;
            return;
        }

        currentFile = fileQueue.shift();
        const fileReader = new FileReader();
        let offset = 0;
        const timestamp = Date.now();

        // å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
        const fileInfo = {
            type: "file-info",
            name: currentFile.name,
            size: currentFile.size,
            timestamp: timestamp,
        };
        fileChannel.send(JSON.stringify(fileInfo));

        // æ·»åŠ å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¾ç¤º
        const fileItem = document.createElement("div");
        fileItem.className = "file-item";
        fileItem.id = `file-send-${timestamp}`;
        fileItem.innerHTML = `
          <div>
            <strong>å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶:</strong> ${currentFile.name} (${formatBytes(
                currentFile.size
        )})
            <div class="progress-bar">
              <div class="progress" style="width: 0%"></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        `;
        elements.fileList.appendChild(fileItem);

        addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", `å¼€å§‹å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶: ${currentFile.name}`);

        // è¯»å–å¹¶å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶åˆ†å—
        fileReader.onload = (e) => {
            if (fileChannel.readyState === "open") {
                fileChannel.send(e.target.result);
                offset += e.target.result.byteLength;

                // æ›´æ–°è¿›åº¦æ¡
                const progress = Math.floor((offset / currentFile.size) * 100);
                const fileItem = document.getElementById(`file-send-${timestamp}`);
                if (fileItem) {
                    const progressBar = fileItem.querySelector(".progress");
                    progressBar.style.width = `${progress}%`;
                }

                // ç»§ç»­è¯»å–ä¸‹ä¸€å—
                if (offset < currentFile.size) {
                    readSlice(offset);
                } else {
                    // æ–‡ä»¶å‘é€å®Œæˆ
                    addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", `æ–‡ä»¶å‘é€å®Œæˆ: ${currentFile.name}`);

                    // å‘é€ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        sendNextFile();
                    }, 500);
                }
            }
        };

        // è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶åˆ†å—
        const readSlice = (o) => {
            const slice = currentFile.slice(o, o + chunkSize);
            fileReader.readAsArrayBuffer(slice);
        };

        readSlice(0);
    }

    // æ ¼å¼åŒ–å­—èŠ‚å¤§å°
    function formatBytes(bytes, decimals = 2) {
        if (bytes === 0) return "0 Bytes";

        const k = 1024;
        const dm = decimals < 0 ? 0 : decimals;
        const sizes = ["Bytes", "KB", "MB", "GB", "TB"];

        const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k));

        return (
                parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(dm)) + " " + sizes[i]
        );
    }

    // æ·»åŠ æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ°èŠå¤©çª—å£
    function addMessage(sender, text) {
        const messageDiv = document.createElement("div");
        messageDiv.innerHTML = `<strong>${sender}:</strong> ${text}`;
        elements.chatMessages.appendChild(messageDiv);
        elements.chatMessages.scrollTop = elements.chatMessages.scrollHeight;
    }

    // å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
    elements.sendBtn.onclick = () => {
        const message = elements.chatInput.value;
        if (
                message.trim() &&
                dataChannel &&
                dataChannel.readyState === "open"
        ) {
            const messageObj = {
                type: "text",
                sender: "å¯¹æ–¹",
                content: message,
                timestamp: new Date().toString(),
            };
            dataChannel.send(JSON.stringify(messageObj));
            addMessage("æˆ‘", message);
            elements.chatInput.value = "";
        }
    };

    // æŒ‰Enterå‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
    elements.chatInput.addEventListener("keypress", (e) => {
        if (e.key === "Enter") {
            elements.sendBtn.click();
        }
    });

    // å¤åˆ¶Offer
    elements.copyOfferBtn.onclick = () => {
        const offer = peerConnection.localDescription;
        elements.sdpTextarea.value = JSON.stringify(offer);
        navigator.clipboard
                .writeText(JSON.stringify(offer))
                .then(() => {
                    elements.statusDiv.textContent = "Offerå·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿";
                })
                .catch((err) => {
                    elements.statusDiv.textContent = "å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥: " + err.message;
                });
    };

    // ç²˜è´´Answer
    elements.pasteAnswerBtn.onclick = async () => {
        try {
            const answer = JSON.parse(elements.sdpTextarea.value);
            if (!answer.type || answer.type !== "answer") {
                throw new Error("æ— æ•ˆçš„Answeræ ¼å¼");
            }
            await peerConnection.setRemoteDescription(
                    new RTCSessionDescription(answer)
            );
            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "Answerè®¾ç½®æˆåŠŸï¼Œè¿æ¥å»ºç«‹ä¸­...";
        } catch (err) {
            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "è®¾ç½®Answeré”™è¯¯: " + err.message;
        }
    };

    // ç²˜è´´Offer
    elements.pasteOfferBtn.onclick = async () => {
        try {
            const offer = JSON.parse(elements.sdpTextarea.value);
            if (!offer.type || offer.type !== "offer") {
                throw new Error("æ— æ•ˆçš„Offeræ ¼å¼");
            }

            await peerConnection.setRemoteDescription(
                    new RTCSessionDescription(offer)
            );

            // åˆ›å»ºAnswer
            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "æ­£åœ¨åˆ›å»ºAnswer...";
            const answer = await peerConnection.createAnswer({
                offerToReceiveAudio: true,
                offerToReceiveVideo: true,
            });
            await peerConnection.setLocalDescription(answer);

            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "Answeråˆ›å»ºå®Œæˆï¼Œè¯·å¤åˆ¶";
            elements.copyAnswerBtn.disabled = false;
        } catch (err) {
            elements.statusDiv.textContent = "è®¾ç½®Offeré”™è¯¯: " + err.message;
        }
    };

    // å¤åˆ¶Answer
    elements.copyAnswerBtn.onclick = () => {
        const answer = peerConnection.localDescription;
        elements.sdpTextarea.value = JSON.stringify(answer);
        navigator.clipboard
                .writeText(JSON.stringify(answer))
                .then(() => {
                    elements.statusDiv.textContent = "Answerå·²å¤åˆ¶åˆ°å‰ªè´´æ¿";
                })
                .catch((err) => {
                    elements.statusDiv.textContent = "å¤åˆ¶å¤±è´¥: " + err.message;
                });
    };

    // æŒ‚æ–­é€šè¯
    elements.hangupBtn.onclick = hangup;

    function hangup() {
        if (peerConnection) {
            peerConnection.close();
            peerConnection = null;
        }
        if (localStream) {
            localStream.getTracks().forEach((track) => track.stop());
            localStream = null;
            elements.localVideo.srcObject = null;
        }
        elements.remoteVideo.srcObject = null;
        elements.localVideoPlaceholder.style.display = "block";
        elements.remoteVideoPlaceholder.style.display = "block";
        elements.remoteVideoPlaceholder.textContent = "é€šè¯å·²ç»“æŸ";
        elements.statusDiv.textContent = "é€šè¯å·²ç»“æŸ";
        elements.chatInput.disabled = true;
        elements.sendBtn.disabled = true;
        enableStartButton();
        elements.hangupBtn.disabled = true;
        addMessage("ç³»ç»Ÿ", "é€šè¯å·²ç»“æŸ");
    }

    // ç¦ç”¨æ‰€æœ‰æŒ‰é’®
    function disableAllButtons() {
        Object.keys(elements).forEach((key) => {
            if (key.endsWith("Btn") && elements[key].disabled !== undefined) {
                elements[key].disabled = true;
            }
        });
    }

    // å¯ç”¨å¼€å§‹æŒ‰é’®
    function enableStartButton() {
        disableAllButtons();
        elements.startBtn.disabled = false;
    }
</script>
</body>
</html>

è´¡çŒ®è€…
